classroom.name: input::before
classroom.style: background-color: #10141E; content: ''; display: block; height: 100%; opacity: 0.6; width: 100%;

classroom.name: input::after
classroom.style: background-color: #10141E; content: ''; display: block; height: 100%; opacity: 0.6; width: 100%;

classroom.name: ul
classroom.style: box-sizing: border-box; list-style: none; margin: 0; padding: 0;

classroom.name: h2
classroom.style: color: white; font-size: 2rem; font-weight: 200; letter-spacing: -0.03125rem; margin: 0;

classroom.name: embla__container
classroom.style: cursor: grab; display: flex; gap: 40px; margin-right: 2em;

classroom.name: embla__slide
classroom.style: display: flex; flex: 0 0 100%; height: 100%; max-height: 230px; max-width: 470px; min-height: 230px; min-width: 0; position: relative; width: 100%;

classroom.name: embla__slide > button
classroom.style: align-items: center; background-color: rgba(16, 20, 30, 0.5); border: none; border-radius: 50%; display: flex; height: 2rem; justify-content: center; position: absolute; right: 1.5rem; top: 1rem; width: 2rem; z-index: 1;

classroom.name: embla__slide > img
classroom.style: border-radius: 8px; display: flex; height: 100%; max-height: 230px; max-width: 470px; object-fit: cover; pointer-events: none; position: absolute; user-select: none; width: 100%; width: 100%;

classroom.name: embla__slide > div:nth-of-type(1)
classroom.style: align-items: center; background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5); border-radius: 8px; box-sizing: border-box; cursor: pointer; display: flex; height: 100%; justify-content: center; opacity: 0; position: absolute; transition: 300ms; width: 100%;

classroom.name: embla__slide > div:nth-of-type(1) > div, .div-show-gallery > ul > li > div:nth-of-type(1) > div
classroom.style: align-items: center; box-sizing: border-box; display: flex; gap: 19px; justify-content: center;

classroom.name: embla__slide > div:nth-of-type(1) > div > span, .div-show-gallery > ul > li > div:nth-of-type(1) > div > span
embla__slide > div:nth-of-type(2)
classroom.style: background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.75) 100%); border-radius: 0 0 8px 8px; bottom: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 4px; left: 0; padding: 24px; position: absolute; width: 100%; z-index: 1;

classroom.name: div-show-gallery > ul > li > div:nth-of-type(1)
classroom.style: align-items: center; background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5); border-radius: 8px; cursor: pointer; display: flex; height: calc(100% - 3.5em); justify-content: center; left: 0; opacity: 0; position: absolute; top: 0; transition: 300ms; width: 100%;

classroom.name: embla__slide > div:nth-of-type(1) > div, .div-show-gallery > ul > li > div:nth-of-type(1) > div
div-show-gallery > ul > li > div:nth-of-type(2)
classroom.style: display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 5px; width: 100%;

classroom.name: embla__slide > div:nth-of-type(2) > div, .div-show-gallery > ul > li > div:nth-of-type(2) > div
embla__slide > div:nth-of-type(2) > div > span, .div-show-gallery > ul > li > div:nth-of-type(2) > div > span
embla__slide > div:nth-of-type(2) > div > p, .div-show-gallery > ul > li > div:nth-of-type(2) > div > p
embla__slide > div:nth-of-type(2) > div > div, .div-show-gallery > ul > li > div:nth-of-type(2) > div > div
embla__slide > div:nth-of-type(2) > div > div > p, .div-show-gallery > ul > li > div:nth-of-type(2) > div > div > p
div-show-gallery
classroom.style: display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 25px; padding-right: 2em;

classroom.name: div-show-gallery > ul
classroom.style: display: grid; gap: 16px; gap: 32px 40px; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(280px, 1fr)); width: 100%;

classroom.name: div-show-gallery > ul > li
classroom.style: align-items: center; border-radius: 8px; display: flex; justify-content: center; position: relative; width: 100%;

classroom.name: div-show-gallery > ul > li > button
classroom.style: align-items: center; background-color: rgba(16, 20, 30, 0.5); border: none; border-radius: 50%; display: flex; height: 2rem; justify-content: center; position: absolute; right: 1rem; top: 1rem; width: 2rem; z-index: 1;

const.placeholder: Search for movies or TV series
